quote: Garcia wondered why people with JESUS stickers on their bumper always drove twenty miles per hour under the speed limit. If God was my co-pilot, he thought, I'd be doing a hundred and twenty.
quote_letters: GARCIA WONDERED WHY PEOPLE WITH JESUS STICKERS ON THEIR BUMPER ALWAYS DROVE TWENTY MILES PER HOUR UNDER THE SPEED LIMIT IF GOD WAS MY CO-PILOT HE THOUGHT ID BE DOING A HUNDRED AND TWENTY
